**Interactions of Clethodim and Dicamba on Glyphosate-resistant Volunteer Corn Control**

<u>Vitor Muller Anunciato</u>; Gabrielle de Castro Macedo; Daniel Araujo Doretto; Jeff A. Golus ; Caio A. Carbonari; Greg R. Kruger.

.pull-left[
<img src="https://github.com/vitoranunciato/volunteercorncontrol/blob/main/docs/imagens/check.JPG?raw=true" width=450 height= 350>
]
.pull-right[
<img src="https://github.com/vitoranunciato/volunteercorncontrol/blob/main/docs/imagens/treated.JPG?raw=true" width=450 height= 350>
]
---
## Introduction

+ Volunteer GR corn are common weed in soybean fields.

+ Can reduce soybean yield through competition, cause problems with harvest,
host insects and diseases, and contaminate soybean seeds at the harvest.

+ Clethodim is known for its good grass control in post-emergence applications.

+ However, antagonistic interactions have been reported when applied in tank-mixtures with synthetic auxins.

---
## Objectives

+ To evaluate the effects of Clethodim and Dicamba tank-mixture on GRVC control (F1 generation) at different heights, with and without the use of non-ionic surfactant (NIS).

---
## Field Trial

+ Field planted at Dryland Farm 2019 and 2020.

    + 25,000 seeds/acre (62.500 seeds/ha).

+ Plants heights: 12 in (30 cm), 24 in (60 cm) and 36 in (90 cm).

+ Split in plots with 10 x 30 ft each (3 x 10 m)

+ TTI 11002. 15 GPA (140 L/ha), 40 psi (276 KPa), 3.9 mph (1.74 m/s)

---
## Treatments
.pull-left[
**No R11 (NIS) in mixture 0.25% v/v**

**1.** Clethodim 76 g ai/ha

**2.** Clethodim 102 g ai/ha

**3.** Clethodim  136 g ai/ha

**4.** Clethodim 76 g ai/ha + Dicamba 560 g ae/ha

**5.** Clethodim 102 g ai/ha + Dicamba 560 g ae/ha

**6.** Clethodim 136 g ai/ha + Dicamba 560 g ae/ha

**7.** Dicamba 560 g ae/ha]

.pull-right[
**With R11 (NIS) in mixture 0.25% v/v**

**8.** Clethodim 76 g ai/ha

**9.** Clethodim 102 g ai/ha

**10.** Clethodim  136 g ai/ha

**11.** Clethodim 76 g ai/ha + Dicamba 560 g ae/ha

**12.** Clethodim 102 g ai/ha + Dicamba 560 g ae/ha

**13.** Clethodim 136 g ai/ha + Dicamba 560 g ae/ha

**14.** Dicamba 560 g ae/ha]

+ All solutions with Intact at 0.5% v/v
